description.value: A path maiden has a fly Speed equal to her Speed but can't fly higher than 10 feet above the ground, and if she ends her turn above a nonsolid surface, she vanishes and rematerializes on the last space she occupied over solid ground and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.

publication.title: Pathfinder #199: To Bloom Below the Web
